17#include "lib.h"
18
19#include <unistd.h>
20#include <fcntl.h>
21
22int lvm_getpagesize(void)
23{
24 return getpagesize();
25}
26
27int read_urandom(void *buf, size_t len)
28{
29 int fd;
30
31 /* FIXME: we should stat here, and handle other cases */
32 /* FIXME: use common _io() routine's open/read/close */
33 if ((fd = open("/dev/urandom", O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
34 log_sys_error("open", "read_urandom: /dev/urandom");
35 return 0;
36 }
37
38 if (read(fd, buf, len) != (ssize_t) len) {
39 log_sys_error("read", "read_urandom: /dev/urandom");
40 if (close(fd))
41 stack;
42 return 0;
43 }
44
45 if (close(fd))
46 stack;
47
48 return 1;
49}
